basics.name: Srinath Satuluri
basics.summary: Computer Science student at University of Houston | Software Engineering Extern at Outamation | Backend Developer specializing in Python, Flask, FastAPI, and AWS

work.summary: Developing Python microservices for enterprise automation solutions. Working with Flask, FastAPI, and SQLAlchemy for backend development. Implementing distributed task processing with Celery and Redis. Deploying and managing services on AWS infrastructure.

Provided one-on-one tutoring for students in algebra, calculus, and statistics for 4+ years. Developed customized learning plans based on individual student needs. Improved student grades by an average of one letter grade.

education.area: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics

portfolio.name: Real-Time Expense Fraud Detection System
portfolio.description: Built multi-layered anomaly detection system inspired by Ramp's prevention-first approach using Flask, PostgreSQL, Docker, and Redis. Implemented real-time transaction processing with sub-500ms response times and designed rule-based and ML-powered fraud detection algorithms.

portfolio.name: Interfere - Self-Healing API System
portfolio.description: Developed system that auto-detects API schema mismatches using TypeScript and Express. Integrated LLM-powered analysis for intelligent issue diagnosis and implemented canary deployment for safe automated fixes.

portfolio.name: WasteNot - Food Donation Platform
portfolio.description: Created full-stack web application connecting food donors with local charities. Implemented user authentication and real-time inventory tracking with responsive UI for seamless mobile and desktop experience.
